sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {
  ChakraProvider,
  Container,
  theme,
  Flex,
  Heading,
  Spacer,
  Box,
  useColorMode,
  Button,
  Link,
  Center,
} from '@chakra-ui/react';

import { ColorModeSwitcher } from './ColorModeSwitcher';

import { BiSun } from 'react-icons/bi';

function App() {
  const { colorMode, toggleColorMode } = useColorMode();

  return (
    <ChakraProvider theme={theme}>
      <Container maxW="100%">
        <Flex spacing="3" padding="10">
          <Heading fontSize="3xl">Sumant Guha</Heading>
          <Spacer />
          <Center spacing="3">
            <Button>Resume</Button>
            <Link
              mr="10"
              textTransform="uppercase"
              fontWeight="300"
              letterSpacing="0.2rem"
              fontSize="xl"
            >
              Home
            </Link>
            <Link
              mr="10"
              textTransform="uppercase"
              fontWeight="300"
              letterSpacing="0.2rem"
              fontSize="xl"
            >
              Contact
            </Link>
            <ColorModeSwitcher />
          </Center>
        </Flex>
      </Container>
    </ChakraProvider>
  );
}

export default App;
